title: Sotiris Antoniou
text:
Sotiris Antoniou (; born 10 September 1975) is a Greek professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a> and former player, who is the current manager of <a href="Super%20League%20Greece%202">Super League 2</a> club <a href="Rodos%20F.C.">Rodos</a>.
Playing career.
He began his career as a footballer from his hometown team <a href="Apollon%20Larissa%20F.C.">Apollon Larissa</a> in 1995. He played for almost 15 years for many historical clubs such as <a href="Xanthi%20F.C.">Xanthi</a>, <a href="Doxa%20Drama%20F.C.">Doxa Drama</a>, <a href="PAE%20Kerkyra">Kerkyra</a>, <a href="Trikala%20F.C.">Trikala</a>, and <a href="P.A.S.%20Korinthos">Korinthos</a>.
Managerial career.
He holds an <a href="UEFA%20Pro%20Licence">UEFA Pro Coaching Licence</a>.
